BOOLEAN FtpServer::ExecCmd (  const FtpRequest &  request  )  [protected, virtual]
 

Executes a command. It returns whether the given FTP command could be processed or not. The return value does not express the result of the operation. This is done by the FTP reply code.

Parameters:
msg The FTP request message.
Returns:
Whether the command could be processed or not.

void FtpServer::Init (   )  [protected, virtual]
 

Protected service interface (called by the constructor). The implementation sends messages to the server itself to prevent ExecutionContext problems and handling all socket events in the server.

Implements Server.

BOOLEAN FtpServer::OnMessage (  const Message &  msg  )  [protected, virtual]
 

Handles a system message.

Parameters:
msg A system message object.
Returns:
Whether the message was handled or not.

Reimplemented from ServiceThread.

void FtpServer::Start (  const InetSocketAddr &  localAddr,
DataConnProfileId  dataConnProfileId = c_invalid_data_conn_profile_id
)  [virtual]
 

Public service interface. The implementation sends messages to the server itself to prevent ExecutionContext problems and handling all socket events in the server.

Parameters:
localAddr Socket address to bind to.
dataConnProfileId ID of the DataConn to use for opening sockets.

Implements Server.

void FtpServer::Stop (   )  [virtual]
 

Public service interface. The implementation sends messages to the server itself to prevent ExecutionContext problems and handling all socket events in the server.

Implements Server.
